item.title: Haditha Marines Vindicated
item.description: The three Marines who were charged and cleared of murdering civilians in Iraq became the poster children for Jack Murtha’s attempts to destroy the U.S. Marine Corps. (I have no doubt that Murtha drank of Ho Chi Minh’s kool-aid in Viet Nam.) Murtha’s lies, smears, libels, and slanders launched an anti-American industry that just held its Yearly Kos nightmare in Chicago. The Marines libeled by Murtha and others are free, now.
